sub_title: Product Manager | Product Owner | UX fan
summary:
My experience in product management and tech industries has sparked my interest in driving customer-centric approach and delivering tech products and websites with exceptional UX.

Adaptable and used to working in international and fast paced environments. A teacher in the past, I’m also a fast diligent learner hungry for knowledge and effective communicator. Passionate about traveling, learning and exploring new things around me.

Product Management  • Website Development Management   • Understanding the Customer   • UX       • eCommerce      • Marketing Analytics   • Marketing Strategy    • Project Management     • User Acquisition  • Product Marketing   •  Digital Marketing

I was responsible for developing idea and content for the website, and pitching our project to Paypal's jury.

profile_positions.title: Program Manager / Product Manager, UX - Digital Content Platform Development

profile_positions.description: Acting as a product manager of the Partner Hub (partner.booking.com) - a content platform built to support, advise and inspire our Booking.com partners. My responsibilities include the release of new product features, UX/design optimizations, backlog management of data-driven improvements and experiments in collaboration with the development, design and brand teams.
profile_positions.title: Senior Specialist / Product Owner - Digital Content Platform Development

profile_positions.description:
• Optimized website to increase ecommerce conversion rate, building new content areas and landing pages, improving website usability and UX, running A/B tests
• Managed the website development, building new features and user flows, improving SEO optimization   
• Leveraged marketing insights and consumer research to inform product and marketing strategy
• Developed and optimized omni-channel digital campaigns (paid search, paid social, affiliate, email, SEO)
• Paid Search Advertising – running ad campaigns, creating ad copy, testing new audience targeting methods (Google Ads, Facebook)  
• Managed eCommerce channels (web store, Amazon, Costco, Walmart)
• Analytics - regularly monitoring website user and purchaser flows by establishing and tracking critical success metrics (e.g. acquisition, bounce, session duration, ecommerce conversion tracking, checkout behavior, user satisfaction)
• Affiliate Marketing program - developing a strategy for referral programs, working with existing partners and finding new affiliates  
• Email Marketing - designing automated email marketing strategy

profile_positions.title: Growth Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
